timeline.title: Our Journey

item1.title: Company Founded
item1.description: B2B was founded with a mission to revolutionize the online trading industry. We started with a small but passionate team.

item2.title: First Platform Launch
item2.description: Released the beta version of our trading platform, attracting over 1,000 first users in the first month.

item3.title: Technology Award
item3.description: Received the 'Innovation Technology of the Year' award from Vietnam Technology Association. Reached 10,000 users milestone.

item4.title: International Expansion
item4.description: Expanded services to international markets, supporting multiple languages and multi-currency payments. Reached 50,000 global users.

item5.title: Rapid Growth
item5.description: Launched AI and machine learning features, grew 300% compared to the previous year. Reached 100,000 users.

item6.title: Industry Leader
item6.description: Became the leading trading platform with over 500,000 users. Continuously innovating and improving services.

hero.title: Connecting
hero.subtitle: Leading B2B platform helping Vietnamese businesses reach the world

story.title: Building bridges for
story.desc1: B2B was born from the belief that every business, big or small, deserves the opportunity to access global markets. In an increasingly connected world, we recognized that Vietnamese businesses have tremendous potential but often face challenges in finding suitable international partners and building sustainable trade relationships.
story.desc2: We are not just a platform - we are a partner, supporting Vietnamese businesses from the first step to success in international markets. With an experienced team of experts and advanced technology, B2B provides comprehensive solutions from strategic consulting, partner connections, to transaction execution support.
story.desc3: Over the past 6 years, we have helped thousands of businesses expand their markets, increase revenue, and build international brands. Each partner's success motivates us to continuously improve and develop.
story.desc4: We believe that international trade is not just about transactions, but about building long-term relationships and creating value for both parties. That's why we always prioritize quality and partner satisfaction in everything we do.
story.quote: Our mission is to eliminate trade barriers and create opportunities for every business.

mission.title: Shaping the Future
mission.missionDesc: B2B is committed to being a trusted bridge between Vietnamese businesses and global markets. We don't just provide tools and platforms, but also accompany businesses in every step of their internationalization journey. Our mission is to empower every business, regardless of size, to compete fairly and succeed on the international stage.
mission.visionDesc: By 2030, B2B will become the leading B2B platform in Southeast Asia, connecting over 10,000 Vietnamese businesses with global markets. We envision a future where every business can easily access international trade opportunities, where language, cultural, and geographical barriers are no longer obstacles. We want to create a digital trade ecosystem where transparency, fairness, and sustainable development are core values.
mission.goal1: Expand partner network to 1,000+ international companies by 2026
mission.goal2: Support 5,000+ Vietnamese businesses to export successfully
mission.goal3: Build AI technology platform to optimize connections and transactions

appDevelopers.title: Mobile App Developers
appDevelopers.description: Find professional mobile app development companies. From iOS to Android, we have partners that match your needs.

services.title: Comprehensive Solutions
services.subtitle: From consulting to execution, we support you at every stage

service1.title: International Partner Connections
service1.desc: We have an extensive global partner network that helps you find and connect with the most suitable companies. Our AI system analyzes needs, capabilities, and goals of both parties to create valuable and sustainable connections. We don't just introduce partners, but also support in negotiation and relationship building processes.

service2.title: Export Strategy Consulting
service2.desc: Our team of experts has over 20 years of experience in international trade. We provide comprehensive consulting services from market analysis, product evaluation, marketing strategy development, to international compliance support. Each plan is customized to fit your industry's characteristics and business goals.

service3.title: B2B Auction Platform
service3.desc: Launched in 2022, B2B's B2B auction platform has revolutionized how businesses buy and sell goods and services. With blockchain and AI technology, we ensure transparency, security, and efficiency in every transaction. Over 10,000 transactions have been successfully completed with a total value of over $500 million.

service4.title: Logistics & Payment Support
service4.desc: We partner with leading logistics providers to offer optimal shipping solutions at competitive costs. Our multi-currency payment system supports over 50 currencies, allowing you to trade easily with partners from any country. We also provide insurance and payment protection to ensure safety for every transaction.

service5.title: Training & Capacity Development
service5.desc: We regularly organize training courses on international trade, negotiation skills, supply chain management, and many other topics. Training programs are designed by leading experts and continuously updated according to market trends. We also provide 1-on-1 consulting and capacity development support for your team.

service6.title: Data Analytics & Reporting
service6.desc: With Big Data and AI technology, we provide detailed analytical reports on markets, trends, opportunities, and risks. Data is updated in real-time to help you make quick and accurate decisions. Customizable dashboards allow you to track performance, manage partner relationships, and optimize business operations.

technology.title: Advanced Technology Platform
technology.subtitle: The power of modern technology serving international trade

tech1.title: Artificial Intelligence (AI)
tech1.desc: We use AI to analyze market data, predict trends, optimize partner connections, and automate processes. Our AI system learns from each transaction to become increasingly intelligent and accurate. This helps us provide the most suitable recommendations for each business.

tech2.title: Blockchain & Security
tech2.desc: Every transaction on the B2B platform is recorded on blockchain, ensuring transparency and immutability. We use end-to-end encryption and multi-layer security measures to protect your information. The system has been tested and certified by leading international security organizations.

tech3.title: Cloud Computing
tech3.desc: Our platform is built on cloud infrastructure, ensuring flexible scalability and 99.9% uptime. Whether you have 10 or 10,000 simultaneous transactions, the system still operates smoothly and stably. We use multi-region deployment to ensure fast access speeds from anywhere in the world.

tech4.title: Mobile-First Design
tech4.desc: Recognizing that most modern users use mobile devices, we designed the platform with a mobile-first approach. Our mobile app provides full features like the web version, allowing you to manage transactions, connect partners, and track performance anytime, anywhere.

culture.title: Work Environment
culture.subtitle: Where talent grows and innovation is encouraged
culture.desc1: At B2B, we believe that people are the most valuable asset. We build a work environment where every employee is respected, heard, and empowered to reach their full potential. We encourage diversity, inclusion, and collaboration across departments.
culture.desc2: We heavily invest in talent development through training programs, mentoring, and advancement opportunities. Our employees are encouraged to learn, experiment, and innovate. We believe the best ideas come from empowering everyone.
culture.desc3: Work-life balance is one of our core values. We provide flexible working hours, remote work options, and wellness programs to ensure employees are always healthy and happy both physically and mentally.

benefits.title: Benefits & Perks
benefits.item2: Comprehensive health insurance for the whole family
benefits.item4: Flexible working hours and remote work

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to B2B. By accessing and using our platform, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. Please read carefully before using our services.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing or using B2B, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, you may not use our services.
section1.item1: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services
section1.item2: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
section1.item3: You agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information

section2.title: 2. Use of Services
section2.content: B2B provides a trading and investment management platform. You agree to use our services lawfully and in accordance with the following guidelines:
section2.item1: Do not use the service for illegal purposes
section2.item2: Do not attempt unauthorized access to the system
section2.item3: Do not share login credentials with third parties

section3.title: 3. Security and Privacy
section3.content: We are committed to protecting your personal information. Your data is encrypted and protected with advanced security measures:
section3.item1: Personal information is encrypted during transmission
section3.item2: We do not share your information with third parties without consent
section3.item3: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal information

section4.title: 4. Liability and Risks
section4.content: Investment trading always involves risks. You understand and accept that: (1) You are solely responsible for your investment decisions, (2) B2B does not guarantee profits, and (3) You may lose part or all of your invested capital. We recommend seeking advice from financial professionals before making investment decisions.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
section5.content: All content, logos, trademarks, and other intellectual property on the B2B platform are the exclusive property of us or our licensors. You may not copy, distribute, or use any content without our written permission.

section6.title: 6. Changes to Terms
section6.content: We reserve the right to update or modify these terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately upon posting on the website. Your continued use of the service after changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: B2B is committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use our platform.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect the following types of information to provide and improve our services:
section1.item1: Personal information: Name, email, phone number, address
section1.item2: Account information: Username, password (encrypted), transaction history
section1.item3: Technical information: IP address, browser type, device used

section2.title: 2. How We Use Information
section2.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
section2.item1: To provide and maintain our services
section2.item2: To improve user experience and develop new features
section2.item3: To send important notifications about services and updates
section2.item4: To detect and prevent fraud, abuse, or illegal activities

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing
section3.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We only share information in the following cases:
section3.item2: With trusted service providers to operate the platform
section3.item3: When required by law or authorized agencies

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: We use advanced security measures to protect your information, including SSL/TLS encryption, firewalls, and strict access controls. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.content: You have the right to access, modify, delete, or export your personal data at any time. You also have the right to object to the processing of your data or withdraw previously given consent.

section6.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section6.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze how you use the platform, and provide personalized content. You can manage cookie settings in your browser.

section7.title: 7. Policy Changes
section7.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date at the top of the page.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

contact.talkDescription: We're here to help you. Drop us a line at
contact.formSubtitle: Fill out the form and we will get back to you within 48h.
